# HMCharacteristicMetadataFormatData

**Global Variable**

Indicates that the characteristic has data blob values.

## Declaration

```swift
let HMCharacteristicMetadataFormatData: String
```

## Discussion

The value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] object containing bytes of data.

## Data

- **HMCharacteristicMetadataFormatTLV8**: Indicates that the characteristic has TLV8 values.
